Interface GameMode

All Known Implementing Classes:
AdventureMaze, CoinMaze, GameModeImp
public interface GameMode

An interface for game modes.

Author:
floren

Method Detail

getMazeArray

int[][] getMazeArray()
Get the array of 0s and 1s in the maze.

Returns:
the array of 0s and 1s denoting walls and roads.

getHint

java.util.ArrayList<Coordinate> getHint(Coordinate curr)
Get hint for the maze.

Parameters:
curr - the current position of the player.
Returns:
an ArrayList of Coordinate from currentPosition to a goal, not including current coordinate.

getStartCoordinate

Coordinate getStartCoordinate()
Get the starting coordinate of the player.

Returns:
the Coordinate of the starting point.

isPath

boolean isPath(Coordinate currCoordinate,
               Direction direction)
Get whether the tile in the direction from current position is a path (not a wall).

Parameters:
currCoordinate - coordinate of current position.
direction - the direction of tile from current position that would like to be examined.
Returns:
true if it is a path(not a wall), false otherwise).

Checks whether a game has finished

Parameters:
playerCoordinate - the coordinate of current player.
Returns:
whether the game is finished or not
